website_summaries.verdict: Best sensor model – opens and closes automatically when you wave your hands over it.
pros: Can opens when it senses hands nearby
Owners love the size of this product – it fits large carry-out boxes or empty gallon containers
Many use one for trash and another for recycling
cons: Some say the sensor doesn't work as well when the batteries start draining

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. The first one I received never closed all the way. Amazon replaced it with another which never closed all the way. I tried to make it work hoping with time it would break in. No way. It is just a piece of junk. I had their old model which did not have this problem; it just simply quite working after a couple of years. Now this one works in slow motion. The only redeemable thing is if I press the close button after is was suppose to close then it sometimes actually closes. The only place for this is in my garbage pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this trashcan for just north of 7 months and the lid's motor does not have enough strength left to even open a 1/4 of the way. At 4 months we started to notice the lack in power in the lid, tried changing the batteries, but saw no improvement. The decrease in power has consistantly plagued us since and now it barely opens. On top of the power issues the open button on the lid has cracked and is now sharp when touched - and this is just after 7 months of use in a household of 4! Not recommended, spend the extra $50 and get a trashcan that will last you multiple years!
customer_reviews.author: erinbean28

customer_reviews.title: overpriced Chinese crap. This is nothing but a couple of rolled ...
customer_reviews.text: Shabby, overpriced Chinese crap. This is nothing but a couple of rolled pieces of very thin gauge "Stainless Steel." It is so flimsy that despite being encased in a virtual Styrofoam "sarcophagus" it had 1 big dent that I was able to pop back in place, but several little dings that I could not. This is way over-priced. If you have young children who, of course, always bump into, and bang things, do not buy this. Very dissatisfied. Yet, because I need a container badly, I'm going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond J. (Skip) O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Worst decision ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst decision ever. Lid closes and opens at all the wrong times. Doesn’t stay open long enough and as soon as your tossing something it closes on you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It lights up like it wants to work but it wouldn't do anything ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS TRASH CAN IS TRASH! I received it and it DID NOT work. Gave it some time, tried new batteries and still didn't work! It lights up like it wants to work but it wouldn't do anything it. So, I returned it and they wanted me to wait almost a month to receive the new one. Needless to say, I cancelled the whole order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Just Not for Very Long
customer_reviews.text: Although I really liked the idea of a trash can that opened automatically, the touch pad on the unit does not stand up over time. Although I used the touch pad sparingly, the touch pad material eventually split. It only lasted a year, and I had to replace it. I had purchased an identical model once before, and it only lasted a year and a half. I would save your money, and invest in a model with a foot pedal which will likely last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: PeeWee

customer_reviews.title: An obviously flawed product given you read the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Any product that malfunctions 8 months after purchase deserves no stars, but I unfortunately have to list at least one. We loved the trash can while it worked, but around seven months after purchasing it we noticed the lid randomly opening and closing every so often. Fast forward a month and the lid now immediately opens upon turning the unit on and stays there. There are many other reviews of the product that state similar problems, so take note. This company should be ashamed for selling such a poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Ok but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I love this can it's my 2nd one the only down side is they only last about 2 years..if that is good for you then it's a winner, it would be a 5 stars for me if it just lasted longer .the electronics just start to deteriorate ,probably from garbage and cleaning etc.but hey that's what it's for they should have put everything but the sensor on the back the keep it less exposed ..but once you have it you can't go back that's why I just ordered another one .the old one still looks good so I'll use it as an outside grill area garbage just no auto feature..overall it an ok item but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: ... the top is very thin and seems to dent easily. So far we have been able to "pop" ...
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** After 3 1/2 months this may be heading out to the trash itself. The sticker that covers the buttons has unpeeled from the unit and dirt and other substances are now able to get into the button mechanism. Cover works some times and not always so the buttons are necessary. Wish this unit lasted longer than a couple months. Very disappointed. Unit works well but the panel on the top is very thin and seems to dent easily. So far we have been able to "pop" out any dents but are expecting that one day it will just be permanently dented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large can but didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Update:. Dropped to one star. On the trash can it said do not return but to call manufacturer. I did and they said I had to email. Email keeps getting returned as undeliverable. Basically waisted money in a trash can that has a broken sensor. I still have four stars although the sensor did not work because when I contacted the company they said they would send me out a new lid free of charge. Pending the new lid and then I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I waited to write my review. This trash can was awesome the first 6 months while it worked.... but then about a month ago the lid began to randomly open and close. Yesterday it started to open and close nonstop. Today, it won't even open, not even with new batteries. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our new trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a stay open button. It is convenient since I make so many trips to the trash can while prepping to cook. The only thing I’m not too thrilled about, is that although we’re not throwing anything away, EVERY TIME we walk by it the lid opens up. But that could just be a matter of placement. We might need to put it somewhere where there’s less “traffic”. Other than that, I’m very happy with our new trash can ☺️👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Xiara Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, good working motion sensor trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this motion sensor trash can. It seems I have messy hands every time I need to throw something out. It's easy to change out the trash liners and the can looks very nice. The can responds quickly and seamlessly opening and closing. That is also a "catch-22" if the can is located in a walk-way area as it will open and shut if you pass to closely by it. But I'm learning to keep my hands away from it when passing by. There is an on/off switch for times when you need to move it around or just want to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J

customer_reviews.title: Sensor failed within 30 days, Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I WANTED to love this product and at first I did. It is very easy to set up and changing the bag is a breeze. But, as may other people have reported, the sensor failed within a VERY short time. Given all the hassles people have reported with trying to get a replacement lid, I am going to throw this piece of trash away.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieInAcworth

customer_reviews.title: Huge Paper Weight
customer_reviews.text: Dies within a year. Purchased 3 of them and they all went bad within a year. Goodluck sending the part back. they told me the button was worn out due to overuse. It is a kitched trashcan for a married couple without kids that cook maybe 4 meals a week. That is completely wrong. Everyone else has the broken button issue. I have been using it with the crappy lift since 2016 and finally decided to replace due to being sick of using the manual lift and it is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: jpgbu1

customer_reviews.title: Broke way to soon!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it when I first got it... Unfortunately within 6 months it broke. The plastic gears literally broke the plastic on top of the lid. Apparently hitting the plastic at the top of the lid is what prevented the low-end from swinging all the way back when it opens the plastic was not strong enough to suit his needs and the Garrabrandt through. Now it’s just a pain in the rear to use the camera because it only has two little small finger holes if you want to open it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: they do not honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces was missing. I contacted the manufacturer and they are not willing to honor their warranty. They ask for a proof of purchase, which I did provide, but the purchase details given on Amazon's website are not good enough for them. Understand, that's who you're dealing with here.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this garbage can for the first year. Then it started getting finicky, the sensor didn’t always work to open the garbage. I had to turn it off and on a lot to reset it. Not it’s jammed on or something, the red light shows there is something in the sensor although there’s nothing there and it won’t work. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Harting

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER A MONTH! NO RESPONSE FROM COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash can in September. It worked for a month. It's now November and the lid does not work. I emailed the company asking them to take into consideration I have only had this for a very short time and would like a new lid or new can. I didn't even get a response. Very disappointed. Could just as well have thrown the money out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Lid Stopped Opening 6 months In
customer_reviews.text: This was a great add to our kitchen. Our guests loved it. Well, now in our 6th month, the lid does not open at all. Before this, it was only opening halfway and making a really annoying sound. We changed the batteries out thinking they were going dead, but nope, no luck. I would recommend for the first few months, but have a backup 4 months in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price. My dog has learned how to open it so thats been a battle but it works great! It's easy to get the bags out and holds a lot. I've also found that it helps contain the smell. Only thing I would change would be how long the lid stays open, if your cleaning out up fridge and scraping containers, if your hand isn't over the sensor it tends to close on your hand so you have to move your bowl/plate/container infant of the sensor while you scrap. But other than that I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Segelbacher

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. The only thing that I don’t like is how sensitive the sensor is. Lid opens every time we walk past it, which will in turn cause batteries to wear out faster. Probably because there are we have it in is a little narrow compared to other locations. But that’s where we have space. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I lovey motion trash can it’s a great purchase I don’t regret and everyone who come over to my house be surprise that they don’t have to touch the trash can to out anything in it and that the trash can open up for them, I love their reaction lol. And it’s very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Qimmah

customer_reviews.title: Please DON'T BUY this crap!
customer_reviews.text: A crap product. Please don't but it. It stopped working after a couple of months. Then I called warranty, they opened a case, need to send back on my own expenses to SEE if they will replace it. 20 bucks for the least expensive shipping. I will not send it back. Will find another product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Ninestar? More like Onestar
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I'm buying this trash can, probably because I like the pain. Every time, the motorized lid has stopped working within 2 months of purchase. Every time. If you want to spend big bucks on a plastic-metal garbage container, buy this device.
customer_reviews.author: kAH-ya

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Such a weird thing to say but I love my new trashcan. We upgraded our kitchen and needed something a little nicer than a black plastic bin. The motion sensor works great and I appreciate the ring that hides the trashbag from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Nice can
customer_reviews.text: I love the hands free garbage feature! The switch is on the outside so be careful not to push this can too hard against the wall as you will turn it off, lol. We couldn't figure out why it kept going off until we realized this.
customer_reviews.author: gramma9562

customer_reviews.title: When I first received this garbage can I was absolutely in love
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this garbage can I was absolutely in love. Like other buyers have stated, the sensor just stopped working. I have to now open the garbage can manually, which defeats the purpose of being touch-less. I wish I would have taken the advice of prior buyers. DON'T DO IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, we ended up buying a second as our first was a gift and the kids broke sensor part of the lid. We bought the second one because I was so pleased with the first one. Now my kids are a bit older and know to just wave your hand. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well for 5 years
customer_reviews.text: This has served well for 5 years. finally, the lid mechanism is acting up. It doesn't close well and the sensor mechanism is peeling off. I wish I could just by a replacement Lid..hate to throw away a good base.
customer_reviews.author: The JAKAL

customer_reviews.title: Lid didn't sit properly
customer_reviews.text: I did return this after buying it as a lightening deal. The lid didn't sit well, not flush with lid housing. It would have been pointless to keep it because it wouldn't descend any further than 1/2" above. It looked lovely but not going to work for us.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: It was everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It’s so nice to walk up to it and it opens nicely
customer_reviews.author: keith fenech

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: A terrible, low quality product. It broke down right after the warranty expired. It now opens and closes whenever it wants.
customer_reviews.author: T. Syn

customer_reviews.title: Lid stopped closing properly
customer_reviews.text: I received my new garbage cans a day early, which was nice. They were working great for 6 days. On day 7 the lid on one of them stopped closing all the way. I have no idea why. The other one is still working, so it may be just 1 that is defective? Maybe there is a way to fix it? I have tried without success.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: bought to keep my 1yo out of the trash
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. He doesn't get yet that you have to wave your hand over it to make the lid open so he just presses buttons. the cool thing is lid sits flush to the rim so he can't get his little fingers in to lift it up.
customer_reviews.author: Salamander

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this garbage can. the only wish is that it had a button that allowed you to keep the lid open. For example, if I'm cleaning out the fridge or scraping a bowl into the trash, I need the lid to stay open. this can does not have that option. Some reviewers said that their motion sensor was too sensitive, but mine is a bit the opposite. i have to wave my finger right over the sensor sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have to be pretty close to the sensor before it activates. It causes you to have to move your hands quick before it gets hit by the lid. Not a battery issue since the problem exist with new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Law Enforcement

customer_reviews.title: 3 years, works fine
customer_reviews.text: 3 years, works fine. After 3 years battery become weak
customer_reviews.author: Alex Roman

customer_reviews.title: Semi operational for 4 months before it totally crapped out.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a HUGE waste. After 4 months the lid belongs in the can it used to sit on. Worked okay for the first 4 months. Occasionally it would have spells where it wouldn't work or would only partially open or close. Want my money back. The cost has doubled for these since I last bought mine. I can only imagine how ripped off people are gonna feel paying twice as much as I did for garbage instead of a garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Drew K.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Can Belongs in a Bigger Garbage Can
customer_reviews.text: Said it came with a liner, it does not. It only has a ring. You can't hide the ugly garbage bag. Shuts VERY quickly, and forcefully... as in, get your hand out fast and don't let small children use it. Motion detection doesn't work all the time. VERY hard to clean, no ventilation. Very disappointed that I spent more than $5.00 on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 years for us!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a lot of these cans break quickly. Mine lasted for 5 years. This easy to operate can is easy to clean and fits in my small kitchen and looks good! Battery life is good with it too and no wire from an adapter to hide either. I have seen poor reviews here but mine worked fantastically well and I got more than twice the life I expected to get from this incredible product. If you take good care of it, it will take great care of you. I’m going to buy it again right now!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Morrisey

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months it quit working. I have to manually open the lid to discard waste now
customer_reviews.author: rjlego2

customer_reviews.title: Shipping not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome, and I am glad I purchased... However, it arrived dented from shipping most likely. I have the dented part facing the cabinet so you can’t tell, but it did arrived dented.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good trash can!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can although I only bought it 4 months ago and the lid barely lifts up, I bought new batteries 2x for it and it’s not changing so I will have to contact the seller and see if I can get a replacement. Still love the trash can! Very spacey
customer_reviews.author: Aamadi

customer_reviews.title: Garbage 😖
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months, it started failing where the lid either wouldn't open or, if it did, would only open half-way
customer_reviews.author: Aga

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was great the first 3 months. Now the sensor is defective... after reading some reviews it's no surprise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The lid stopped opening completely after 3 months - it opens very slowly and only an inch rather than the full range of motion. I replaced the batteries, but it did not fix the problem. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this item. The automatic lid stopped working less than two months after we got it. We thought it was a battery problem, but new batteries didn't fix it. I had a different automatic can, whose lid worked for years, but I replaced it because the can design made it difficult to change the bag. This one is great for bag changes, but the automatic lid is a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great look for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can! It was easy to set up and works great! Exactly what I was looking for and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid broken in less than 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Well, less than 7 months later, the lid stops working, so I open it up only to find that the wire attached to the magnet has come off. The problem is that this wire is so brittle that you can't solder it back on. What a poorly made lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too expensive not to work right
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two and both of them the automatic opener stopped working in less then 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Curtis F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Garbage Can!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this garbage can makes your family stay germ free as the kids no longer touch the garbage 😀 put your hand facing the motion sensor and it opens
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: One month after I used it, the lid started ...
customer_reviews.text: One month after I used it, the lid started to keep closing and opening without a stop. Can we get a replacement of the lid?
customer_reviews.author: Shuo S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few days!
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn't work at all. We put brand new batteries in it and after a few days the buttons open and close did not open and close the product. And when we pressed close, it wouldn't close it all the way. Haven't had the thing 2 months and we have to do it manually, but even then it won't close all the way. Spend a little extra money to get one that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: so much better than my old trash can. It makes the kitchen look clean and neat. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Lid will rust
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking this product but the inside of lid gets rusty and I bought it in February. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LiL Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: Changes the way my kids operate auto open and shuts.. They can't just toss and run.. Less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Denzel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly over sensitive to motion nearby, but generally works great and keeps your hands clean.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered damaged... dented from shipping. The dent popped out, but left two small wraps in the metal. And the sensor seems fishy and an intermittent response on occasion after a day of use. Extremely thin and feels like I'll break it by tapping out my coffee grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective lid
customer_reviews.text: Lid doesn't work! Tried several brands of batteries and nothing, just makes a loud humming sound.
customer_reviews.author: nathan j mcneely

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It functions perfectly, every time. It accommodates all brands of the tall kitchen bags and holds them securely so they don't fall into the can when full. Easy to clean and looks great. I like the quietness of the operation too.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH FIRMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash can
customer_reviews.text: The trash can is great. Opens when motion is detected. Easy to change out bags. I ordered this for my 87 year old mother and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MI843

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new trash can. It works so well. The size is perfect. I love the ring in the inside that holds the trash bag in place. Our old trash can never had that and the bag would always sink in on one side.
customer_reviews.author: HLove

customer_reviews.title: Wally
customer_reviews.text: Love it and so my grandchildren. They also gave it a name and it's "Wally"
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality motion sensor trash container
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my original motion sensor trash container from the same manufacturer and realty love this new one. It's a great quality and love the size and shape. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn't Close All the Way
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new beautiful garbage can and the lid won't close all of the way. It seems from reading the other reviews that you have a 1 out of 4 chance of receiving a poorly made one of these. Order at your own risk. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Design of on/off button needs to be changed
customer_reviews.text: Button on back is a bad design. It gets pushed against the wall and turns itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great automatic trashcan, love it. Yes, I would recommend this product instead of spending more money, the Ninestars motion sensor is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: May seem frivolous Covid made it a requirement.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the item my wife thought it was a needless purchase. Today she say she will never have buy a regular trash can again. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The trash can does not have a separate can inside so if something leaks it seeps out of the bottom onto your floor. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AllStar

customer_reviews.title: So nice I had to order twice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can! My sister came to visit and love it too so I ordered one for her as well!
customer_reviews.author: DFelder

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product is defective with no way to contact seller online. Does not work at all. I can only imagine the cost to ship it back. Complete rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Strasse

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan died around the 1.5-2 year mark for me. It's decent if you're looking for a short term option with infrared.
customer_reviews.author: Tailor Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged nicely with no dents. It has a ring to put the bag on so it’s not hanging out of the can. The batteries seem to be lasting a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Trash can
customer_reviews.text: Works great looks really nice. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Norman V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite! Large capacity. Long battery life. Excellent motion sensor.
customer_reviews.author: MMW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Just what we expected. The sensor works great.
customer_reviews.author: Danabubbis

customer_reviews.title: Way to go
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I’ve used it all day. 9stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: JTLEITNER

customer_reviews.title: Great for a busy household
customer_reviews.text: best purchase we could have made for our household! It keeps the kids' hands from touching it, and works great when your hands are full. Just for info, if you have large dogs, they *can* open this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Motion activation does not work. But since I used this trash can for recycling I didn't worry about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Vmlipsit

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this trash can. The motion detector sensor works really well and the overall looks is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Island

customer_reviews.title: Bad Motor
customer_reviews.text: The garbage can itself work and looks great but after 1-2 week the motor does not have enough power to lift the lid anymore. We have tried new batteries and anything else we can think of but always have to give it a little push to open. I would never by this trash can again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long the automatic lid will work, but this is a great trashcan so far.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: After less than 3 days is does not work at all. It has brand new batteries and worked perfectly for about 4 minutes on the first day. So disappointed. Update: It does work. There is a switch on the back that I didn’t notice that must have gotten switched to off. My fault!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Functional and a Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid trash can. It's well designed and quickly opens when motion crosses the red light. A nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Elizabeth McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Open sesame
customer_reviews.text: Nice style easy to use a real spoiler around the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier.
customer_reviews.text: At first we thought it was more than what we really needed. Now I'm thinking of buying two more. That automatic lid is a time saver. It's easier to remove when bag is full. Would recommend to anyone but particularly older people.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Burhans

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Glad the lid is a little more sturdy than previous models.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Crappy trash can
customer_reviews.text: There are several issues I have with this. I just received it and my first impression isn’t good. I have seen 3 places where the can was indented. And the can doesn’t open until I have been standing in front of it for at least 1 minute. I am very upset and would like for someone to send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Good

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: I feel like we've had this thing forever. It's held up. After more than two years it still functions really well. Still using the original batteries we put in it. So thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Liz DK

customer_reviews.title: ninestars DZT -50-13
customer_reviews.text: You have to have your hand to close-10in for the lid to open .Otherwise well made product.
customer_reviews.author: john glover

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, but the the sensor is touchy. The on and off switch is in a poor location. It is on the back of the lid. Our trash sits the the back to the cupboard so the switch also gets turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Update: I call customer care at nine star and they will ship me one new unit, thus changed my previous star rating, amazing people!
customer_reviews.author: Farhad Mujaddadi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: had to return. came non-working . should have listened to the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: bunnyblue

customer_reviews.title: Great Asset!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased these because of the lid and the infrared open. This was to keep my dog out of the garbage. Looks great. Opening works great. Easy to use. (On another note, it took less than two days for my very smart dog to realize she only had to put her very long snout over the red light to open the can!)
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Touch free trash can works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can air tight no odors never have to touch your garbage
customer_reviews.author: Ace Basin Electtronics

customer_reviews.title: Trash can auto lid
customer_reviews.text: 30 days in use and so far, just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this motion sensor trash can to replace a similar one that I have had for 8 years. It works perfect and looks very nice in my kitchen. Everybody who comes to my house wants one. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frequent trash removal
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy, works very well nice size. Just wished there were some sort of liner or ventilation, I find I need to dump trash frequently because food starts to simmer quick. 🤢 Overall not bad
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Holman

customer_reviews.title: Nice except for seam running down the front.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a higher rating except for the fact that our can has a seam down the front instead of in the back. Looks kind of weird. Don't have time to mess with trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

product_meta.title: Ninestars DZT-50-13 Automatic Touchless Motion Sensor Oval Trash Can with Black Top, 13 gallon/50 L, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:13 Gal. 50 L| Color:Stainless SteelThis 13 Gal Stainless Steel trash can is designed and engineered by NINESTARS, the world's first legal patent holder. With its sleek rectangular fingerprint-resistant design, it can be used in almost any place, such as the home, office, kitchen, bedroom, dorm room or a kid's room. This durable trash can uses the most advanced sensor technology which can be found in all Ninestars' trash cans. Pass your hand or debris within ten inches or a 130° angle from the infrared sensor and the lid will automatically open. The lid will remain open if debris or hand remains within the range of the infrared sensor. Three seconds after your hand moves away from the lid, it will close automatically. Power lasts up to 6 months in normal daily usage. It includes a ring liner to keep trash bag from public view for a neat and clean appearance.
feature_bullets: 【Hassle Free Two-Year Warranty】Hassle free warranty process with our dedicated customer service line and at no additional charges for your defective parts
【Advanced Technology】 Delay sensing technology preserves battery life and prevents any unnecessary opening from pets, children, or walking by. Quiet closing function for longivity of product life.
【Touch-free Motion Sensor Lid Clouser】Seal odor in and eliminate cross-contamination of germs. Requires 3 C batteries (not included), Alkaline battery highly recommended for best performance.

【Ease and Convenient】Removable ring liner holds trash bag sturdy in place and prevents bag from overhanging for a neat and clean appearance. Use any standard trash bags or NINESTARS custom trash bags NSTB-13-30.

【High Quality Materials】Water-resistant infrared motion sensor prevents moisture or any accidental spills from damaging the unit. Plust finger-print resistant stainless steel base helps keep the can clean.
